snp4.12:3.2: Bālomako → bālo mago (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
snp4.12:4.3: parihīnapañño → koci nihīnapañño (bj, sya-all); kocipi nihīnapañño (mr) | te → nānāto (mr)
snp4.12:14.2: suddhimakevalī te → suddhimakevali te (bj); suddhimakevalīno (si, pts-vp-pli1)
snp4.12:16.3: medhagamāvaheyya → medhagaṁ āvaheyya (bj, sya-all); medhakaṁ āvaheyya (pts-vp-pli1)
